    return x + y

add_five = closure_2_parameter(5, add)
print(add_five(10)) # Returns 15","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"472a46a0-5258-4577-adda-0c7fde0e4552","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"b2e77e34-faa7-43ca-b395-da888f792b17","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why use this module?","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f4a787f8-4a64-40a7-9611-bdb4feceb1da","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Consistency","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Ensures that all generated identifiers (like loop names or lambda tags) follow the same naming convention across a project.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2cf730d0-3edc-4e49-966c-87f8928f49de","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Path Management","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Simplifies the conversion between OS file systems and Python's internal module referencing system.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"475db5f8-0606-4c36-aed6-23039bf4d68f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Functional Adaptability","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"closure_2_parameter","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" allows you to adapt general functions into specific callbacks without using ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"lambda","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" everywhere.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6d44428b-f7bc-4c49-a724-bbd270ea68cc","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
